ticket_text: I was charged twice for this month's membership. Please issue a refund.
answer: I’m sorry for the duplicate charge. I’ve processed a refund for the extra payment—it should appear on your statement within 5-7 business days.

ticket_text: My invoice shows an incorrect amount. Can you correct it?
answer: Apologies for the mistake. I’ve corrected your invoice and resent it to your email address.

ticket_text: I upgraded to Elite last week but haven't seen the pro-rated charge. Explain?
answer: Thanks for upgrading! Your prorated charge will reflect on your next billing cycle. I’ve also applied it manually—please check your dashboard.

ticket_text: I want to cancel my subscription but keep getting charged. Need assistance.
answer: I’m sorry you’re experiencing this. I’ve canceled your subscription effective immediately and issued a refund for any recent charge.

ticket_text: Can you provide a detailed breakdown of last month's coaching fees?
answer: Certainly! I’ve emailed you a detailed breakdown of all coaching fees from last month. Let me know if you have any questions.

ticket_text: The video player keeps buffering and won't load session recordings.
answer: I apologize for the buffering issue. Please try clearing your browser cache or switching to Chrome. We’re also investigating server performance.

ticket_text: I get an error 404 when trying to access the resource library.
answer: Our resource library URL changed—here’s the updated link [new URL]. Let me know if you still see the 404.

ticket_text: My webinar playback audio is out of sync with the video.
answer: I’m sorry about the sync issue. I’ve reprocessed the video—please try the link again and let me know if it’s better.

ticket_text: The download links for the worksheets are broken.
answer: Thanks for reporting this. I’ve updated the links and confirmed they’re working. Please try downloading again.

ticket_text: I can't upload my assignment in the portal—it times out.
answer: I’m sorry for the timeout. Please try uploading in smaller parts or use Wi-Fi. If it still fails, send the file to support email.

ticket_text: Do you have transcripts for the last Q&A session?
answer: Yes! Here’s the transcript for the last Q&A session: [link]. Feel free to download and review.

ticket_text: Can you share the slides from yesterday's mastermind call?
answer: Absolutely—here are the slides from yesterday: [link]. Let me know if you need anything else.

ticket_text: Where can I find the updated coaching curriculum outline?
answer: The latest curriculum outline is available under ‘Resources > Curriculum’. Here’s the direct link: [link].

ticket_text: Is there a summary or cheatsheet for the productivity module?
answer: Yes, here’s a one-page cheatsheet for the productivity module: [link]. Enjoy!

ticket_text: Could you send me the bonus templates promised in the welcome email?
answer: I’ve resent the bonus templates to your inbox—please check your spam folder if you don’t see them.

ticket_text: I'd like to reschedule my 1:1 coaching call next week.
answer: Sure! Please pick a new time using my Calendly link: [link], and the new invite will go to your email.

ticket_text: What time zones are available for scheduling sessions?
answer: We offer sessions from 8 AM to 5 PM EST, PST, and GMT. Use the scheduler link to see slots in your local time.

ticket_text: Can I book an extra group coaching slot this month?
answer: Yes—you can add up to two extra slots. Use this link to book: [link]. Let me know if you need help.

ticket_text: My scheduled session disappeared from my calendar.
answer: I’m sorry for the confusion. I’ve resent the calendar invite—please accept it, and it should appear again.

ticket_text: How do I join the live coaching event tomorrow?
answer: Just click the Zoom link in your confirmation email 10 minutes before the start time. Here it is again: [link].

ticket_text: I want to cancel my trial before it renews. What is the process?
answer: I can cancel your trial immediately. Just confirm your account email, and I’ll handle it for you—no charges will apply.

ticket_text: Please cancel my subscription effective immediately.
answer: Your subscription has been canceled effective today. You won’t be billed again, and you still have access until period end.

ticket_text: Can you confirm the penalty for canceling mid-term?
answer: There’s a $50 mid-term cancellation fee according to our terms. Would you like to proceed?

ticket_text: I'm considering canceling—what are the differences between plans?
answer: Elite includes 1:1 coaching, Q&A calls, and resources. Pro offers group calls and resources only. Let me know which you prefer.

ticket_text: How do I cancel the Elite coaching add-on only?
answer: I’ve removed the Elite add-on from your account—your base membership remains unchanged.

ticket_text: The recent module felt rushed. Can you slow down the pace?
answer: Thank you for the feedback. We’ll extend module durations moving forward to ensure a more relaxed pace.

ticket_text: I love the content but would like more real-world examples.
answer: Great suggestion! We’ll add more case studies and examples in upcoming sessions.

ticket_text: The coach's audio was too quiet. Could this be fixed?
answer: I’ve increased the audio levels on the recording. Please check the updated version here: [link].

ticket_text: Great program, but I found the group calls too long.
answer: Understood. We’ll shorten future group calls to 45 minutes and focus on the most critical topics.

ticket_text: The downloadable charts are hard to read. Can you improve them?
answer: Absolutely—we’ve updated the charts with larger fonts and better contrast. Download the new versions here: [link].

ticket_text: I'm unable to update my billing address in my profile.
answer: You can update your billing address under Profile > Billing. I’ve also updated it for you—please verify.

ticket_text: My account dashboard isn't displaying correctly.
answer: Try clearing your cache or using an incognito window. If it persists, let me know and I’ll investigate further.

ticket_text: I need to change my membership email address.
answer: I’ve updated your account email—please check your inbox to confirm the change.

ticket_text: Please delete my old account and migrate my data to a new one.
answer: Your old account has been deleted and your data migrated to your new account. Please confirm access.

ticket_text: I can't see my past invoices under account settings.
answer: I’ve re-synced your billing records—you should now see all past invoices under Billing > Invoices.

ticket_text: I forgot my password and the reset link isn't working.
answer: Here’s a direct password reset link: [link]. If you don’t receive it, check your spam or let me know.

ticket_text: Please reset my password; I haven't received the email.
answer: I’ve resent the reset email and confirmed delivery. Check your spam folder and let me know if it still doesn't arrive.

ticket_text: How can I enable two-factor authentication on my account?
answer: Go to Security Settings > Two-Factor Authentication, follow the prompts, and scan the QR code with your authenticator app.

ticket_text: I changed my password but still can't log in.
answer: I’ve manually reset your password and emailed you a temporary one. Please use it to log in and update to a new password.

ticket_text: Can you help me secure my account with a stronger password?
answer: We recommend at least 12 characters with numbers and symbols. Let me know if you’d like more tips or assistance.

ticket_text: I'd like to switch to a different coach for my sessions.
answer: Sure—please let me know your preferences, and I’ll match you with another coach.

ticket_text: My assigned coach has been unavailable—can I get a replacement?
answer: I apologize for the inconvenience. I’ve assigned you a new coach—details have been emailed to you.

ticket_text: How do I request a second opinion from another coach?
answer: You can request a second opinion by filling out this form: [link]. We’ll schedule it within 24 hours.

ticket_text: I want more coaching hours with my current coach.
answer: You can purchase additional hours here: [link]. Let me know if you’d like me to add them to your account.

ticket_text: Can I have a meet-and-greet with potential coaches before choosing?
answer: Absolutely—book a 15-minute meet-and-greet here: [link]. You can meet any coach available.

ticket_text: What are the perks of the Elite vs. Pro membership?
answer: Elite offers 1:1 coaching, exclusive Q&A calls, and premium resources. Pro includes group calls and standard resources.

ticket_text: Is there a family or team membership discount available?
answer: Yes, we offer a 20% discount for teams of 3 or more. Contact sales@coaching.com for details.

ticket_text: Can I pause my membership for vacation?
answer: You can pause your membership for up to 2 months. I’ve placed your account on hold—let me know when you return.

ticket_text: Do you offer lifetime membership pricing?
answer: We do! Our lifetime plan is currently $1,499. I’ve attached the purchase link here: [link].

ticket_text: How do I revert from Elite back to the basic membership?
answer: I’ve downgraded your account to Basic. Your next bill will reflect the new rate.
